description:
Comes with magnificent must-haves for fans of the series: a Digital Artbook (with 100+ pages of exclusive illustrations, storyboards, and more) and a Digital Soundtrack (featuring the now-elusive melodies of THE KING OF FIGHTERS XIII)!

* This content is a bonus for the Deluxe Edition and is not sold separately.
* Names and other terms featured in the artbook are reproduced as is, based on resource materials from the time of the gameâ€™s original release.
*The Digital Artbook and Digital Soundtrack cannot be played in-game. This is a separate application from the full version of the game.
name: THE KING OF FIGHTERS XIII GLOBAL MATCH Artbook & Soundtrack
